name: Arif Setiawan
bio: Hi! I'm Arif Setiawan, a Backend Developer based in Bandar Lampung, Indonesia. I have a passion for web development and love to create for web and mobile devices. But I also have a lot of experience in the field of mobile application development.

workExperience.title: Smart Village Lampung
workExperience.description: Develop and maintain the Smart Village Lampung website and mobile application (SSO, E-Voting, E-Commerce, etc).

workExperience.title: Uniland Furniture
workExperience.description: Develop and maintain the Uniland Furniture website and mobile application.

workExperience.title: Institut Teknologi Sumatera
workExperience.description: Develop and maintain the Institut Teknologi Sumatera website and mobile application.
